column4: I know I can mount it but I have about 7TB's of images I would like to be able to script something to convert 1 ISO at a time and dump it into a new dir.
you can't convert isos because it is an image, not a format for media
I figured as much as well. Just going to be alot of work to re-rip everything and convert it manually
I appreciate the help, I have to run for now. Have a good one
